title: Military Men's Sports Analog Quartz Watch Dual Display Alarm Digital Watches with LED Backlight
features: Adopt popular pointer & digital dual display design,the Quartz Movement with digital analog display provides precise and accurate time keeping. The soft and breathable PU strap is not only stylish, but also comfortable to wear.

with stopwatch, dual-time display, independent alarm, 12/24H time, calendar, LED backlight(show time clear in the dark ), waterproof, shockproof and other functions. These features make it the perfect choice for all kinds of outdoor sports and everyday use.
5ATM Daily Waterproofï¼šWater resistant for daily use,such as splash/rain,but not suitable for swimming ,bathing or diving and so on.

The sporty digital watch is available in a variety of colors. Suitable for all men,especially those who like doing sports, multi-functions make it perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing and so on.

Durable and comfortable for daily wear, Comfortable and soft band, ABS body and scratch resitance glass-enough strong for sport activities. Adopt imported quartz movement and long-life battery to keep precise time.
description: Style :  Military Sport Dual Display Watch , analog and digital dual dial support two different timezone,can switch time around the world, suitable for global travel, field activities.
